name: Simple farming sim
description:
This game was created by a group of 3 in the span of 4 days.

Programming/level design - me
Environment - Keegan
Character/Animations - Zaide

controls
WASD - walk
Q - change seed
F - plant seed, water plant, sell harvest

Max invent size is 75 for each harvest type and max water is 100 but can be upgraded to 20.
